_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map CS_ONSLAUGHTDAY

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: September 08 2016

Here is the Navigation Mesh for fast paced urban-themed map cs_onslaught by neozyem (released March 2012). It's a fully reworked and manually optimized .nav-file (because in original author's BSP was embedded slightly edited auto-gen NAV).

Most areas and paths were remade manually and some additional paths were created from scratch. Some broken-off important pathways were restored. Also the set of other inaccuracies were corrected.

Also this Navigation Mesh was fully Place Painted (more detailed and pertinently than in the original nav-file).

Well... the bots have opportunity to use all walkable ways now. But unfortunately the hostages aren't capable to move through a ladder (Rear-Apartement) what limits a gameplay a little :-(

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original navigation file by map creator embedded in .bsp and available to downloading with the same map.

Fight and Fun! Your responses and remarks are always welcomed :-)

Credits and Gratitudes:  neozyem (for nice urban-themed map).

Additional Gratitudes:   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),   Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Never Say Die!
